埇字的基本解释

埇
yǒng
地名用字。
在路上加土。

埇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǒng］
［《廣韻》余隴切，上腫，以。］
地名用字。安徽省有埇桥，广东省有埇头墟。

埇字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　埇； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页229第24
【廣韻】余隴切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】尹竦切，?音勇。道上加土。與甬道甬同。　又地名，在淮泗閒。

暂无。

[①]［yǒng］
["Guangyun" Yu Long cut, swollen on the top, to. ]
Place names in words. There are Yongqiao in Anhui Province and Yongtou Ruins in Guangdong Province.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　埇; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 229-24
[Guangyun] Yu Longqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Yin Yuqie,? Yinyong. Add soil to the road. Same as Yongdao Yong.　 Also the name of the place, leisurely in Huaisi.
